main event: Military personnel at Forbes AFB, Kansas observed a stationary elongated flat object in the sky that appeared to change color and position.
interesting points: The object was shiny silver and appeared approximately 10 to 15 miles from the observers,The left side of the object was brighter than the right side despite the sun shining on the right side,Observers reported the object was about the size of a half-dime,The sighting lasted approximately five minutes, The object was located 7 degrees above the horizon and was obscured by a cloud bank.
sighted object: an elongated flat object in the sky
witness description: William W. Cory, Major, USAF and Joseph McQuaid, Major, USAF, both familiar with celestial bodies and aircraft
